snippet.title: WonderHero Heroes Assemble
snippet.description:
WonderHero is a Play To Earn Mobile RPG, featuring exciting tactical turn-based battles, where players can earn game tokens and NFTs. 

----------------------
Game Info
----------------------
Genre: Turn-based strategy (TBS)
Platforms: Android, iOS

----------------------
How to Get Started
----------------------
You need WonderHero NFTs to play, before you purchase any, please read the Starter's Guide: https://wonderhero.gitbook.io/wonderhero/beginner-setup-guide/getting-started

----------------------
Official Link:
----------------------
Website: https://wonderhero.io
Discord: https://discord.io/wonderhero
Twitter: https://twitter.com/wonderhero_io
Telegram: https://t.me/wonderhero_io
Facebook: https://facebook.com/wonderhero_io
Youtube: https://youtube.com/c/wonderhero_io
Twitch: https://twitch.tv/wonderhero_io
